title: Error compiling circuit_synthesizer
body:
I get an error when launching the following command

`zk f cargo run --features "gpu" --release --bin zksync_circuit_synthesizer`


```
Compiling api v0.1.0 (https://github.com/matter-labs/era-heavy-ops-service.git?branch=v1.3.3#0dd1f5db)
error[E0415]: identifier `setup` is bound more than once in this parameter list
   --> /home/ps/.cargo/git/checkouts/era-heavy-ops-service-54439bd555659c38/0dd1f5d/api/src/lib.rs:171:33
    |
171 |         #[cfg(feature = "gpu")] setup: &AsyncSetup, // uses Default = CudaAllocator
    |                                 ^^^^^ used as parameter more than once

error[E0412]: cannot find type `CudaAllocator` in this scope
  --> /home/ps/.cargo/git/checkouts/era-heavy-ops-service-54439bd555659c38/0dd1f5d/api/src/lib.rs:65:5
   |
65 |     CudaAllocator,
   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ not found in this scope
   |
help: consider importing this struct
   |
3  + use gpu_prover::cuda_bindings::CudaAllocator;
   |

error[E0412]: cannot find type `AsyncSetup` in this scope
   --> /home/ps/.cargo/git/checkouts/era-heavy-ops-service-54439bd555659c38/0dd1f5d/api/src/lib.rs:171:41
    |
171 |         #[cfg(feature = "gpu")] setup: &AsyncSetup, // uses Default = CudaAllocator
    |                                         ^^^^^^^^^^ not found in this scope
    |
help: consider importing this struct
    |
3   + use gpu_prover::AsyncSetup;
    |

Some errors have detailed explanations: E0412, E0415.
For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0412`.
error: could not compile `api` (lib) due to 3 previous errors
```
